pages.text: $(bgreen)Grave Buster$() wants everyone to know that it loves kittens and spends its off hours volunteering at a local zombie rehabilitation center, $(m)despite its fearsome appearance$().$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-kill$() plant that can eat and $(bred)destroy several TombStones nearby 5 blocks$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will summon $(l)several GraveBusters$() to eat TombStones.
